chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: In today's video, we will learn about Core Web Vitals and why Core Web Vitals are necessary.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Like this video and keep high energy.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The thing is that your website should be in your iPhone, iPad, Android, Surface Pro 4 devices.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Because we have to give good experience to all users through our website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: In this video, we will also learn about Chrome's hidden tool which is called Lighthouse.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: How can you use it to enhance your website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: In the comment section, write down Sigma Batch OP.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Let's go to the computer screen and let's roll the intro.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So guys, I have come to my computer screen.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And I will make a new folder which is called Video 6.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Video 6.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And in Video 6, I will click on VS Code as always.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And today, I am going to tell you about SEO.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: First of all, I want to tell you what SEO is.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: SEO stands for Search Engine Optimization.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You can see any website and it has SEO.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Let's take an example of Amazon.in.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I opened Amazon.in and I wanted to download this website as soon as possible.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So that they can get their products in the search.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Google is a search engine.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Google's responsibility is to show good pages to users.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So Google will only show those pages which will be fast.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: They present good information and along with that,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: there are some things which are good for users.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: For example, there are two pages from the editor.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: One page has told about Dogfood.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The other page has also told about Dogfood.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But among these two, page 2 is very fast and loads well.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So Google will give more preference to it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Along with that, there are core web vitals which Google considers to rank two pages.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: First of all, content is the most important.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If your content is good, you can rank it without the code web vitals.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But if you are competing with a page with the same content,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: which has a similar quality content,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then your core web vitals will be seen.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If your core web vitals are good, you will be given preference.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So the first thing that comes in core web vitals is your CLS.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Look at this video which I have run on the web.dev website.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You will see that someone comes to your website and in order to cancel it,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: the error that was made by the person who canceled it,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: the above thing became visible.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And it shifted the layout.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And the order was completed.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But if the user wanted the order to be completed, he wanted to click on it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: In this way, the user experience is very bad.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And as you saw in this video, this shouldn't happen.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: That's why our CLS should be at least.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now what is the definition of CLS?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Cumulative layout shift means,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: how much the page is shifting while loading.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Suppose you have loaded the page and you get to see this first.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This was above and after that, when this load was loaded,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then all this shifted down.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The layout shouldn't shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If you put vit and ride in images, then the layout shouldn't shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The next metric we are going to talk about is LCP.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And LCP stands for largest contextual paint.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This means that if the user is viewing a page,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then the biggest element is on it.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: For example, the biggest part in this is this image.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: How long does it load?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The entire page will be loaded.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But the biggest element which is most important is how long does it load?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The meaning of web.dev and Google is a good LCP score.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: It should be 2.5 seconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Meaning, the biggest element should be loaded in 2.5 seconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: After this comes the third metric, FID.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Which stands for First Input Delay.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: The first input delay means that

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: if any user clicks on an input element, like on the button,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: or any type of input given on a page,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then how long does that input process?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: For example, if you click on a button,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then the button click browser processes in how long?

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And the meaning of Google and web.dev is

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: that your input should start processing in less than 100 milliseconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So these were the three core web vitals which are very important.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I will tell you for the information that these core web vitals are updated too.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: But these are very important and you should know.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now I will show you what the Lighthouse report is and why it is generated.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And how will you get these core web vitals value from there.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So I will tell you here, if you guys inspect it right click,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: and you can say that I am coming on the right side,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then you can click here and drag it down.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You can drag it down again and drag it down again.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I prefer to drag it down because it is my habit to look down from the beginning.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now here you can see the option of Lighthouse.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Lighthouse basically generates a report and tells you

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: what can be improved in your HTML page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: For example, if I want to see in mobile here,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: how my website looks to mobile users,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then I will click on mobile,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then I will click on desktop,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I will close this tab, I will click on mobile,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: and here I will click on analyze page load,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then this report will generate for me.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So here you can see that a report is generated,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: performance, accessibility, best practices, SEO, PWA,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: all these things are shown here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now here you can see that some things are shown here in red,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: that is the scope of improvement is in the page.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now here you can see that you can size your images properly,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: which can be loaded to your website in 2.7 seconds.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So all these suggestions are given to you by Lighthouse.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And if you incorporate these suggestions,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then your website will be loaded very well and

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: the user will have a good experience.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Now you can see here that image elements do not have explicit width and height.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So you should give width and height,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: the width and height attribute of image that we have read in the last video,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: should be used so that it is reserved in your browser.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: When we set width and height in HTML,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then space in the browser is reserved.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Otherwise, if we do not set height and width,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then what will happen is that the browser will not know

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: how much space we have to reserve.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And the longer the CSS load is,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: the lower the page will shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So we do not want our page to shift during loading time.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: If our page starts shifting,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then if we click here,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then when it shifts from the wrong side,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then it can be done here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Suppose there was an image here,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: I am going to click here.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And the more I clicked here,

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: then this image is loaded and all this content will shift down.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And instead of clicking here, I will click on the image.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: This is called cumulative layout shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So this kind of shift is not preferred at all.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Google does not prefer it at all.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: And this should be at least.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: You can see that the space is very less.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: Cumulative layout shift.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So we have to keep the cumulative layout shift at least.

chunks.title: SEO and Core Web Vitals in HTML
chunks.text: So that our user can get a very good experience.
